list.name: Changes
list.comment: statistics function in poker game now can correctly update numbers to text file

task.summary: Default task
Initial Commit
Menu A crude menu was added to Poker Game. The only button that works as intended right now is the Exit button :)
Menu Start game button will load poker game window. (Which is currently empty)
The Poker Game and Poker Menu Changed how the start game button switches scenes to the Poker Game. Added a button in the Poker Game that will return the user back to the menu
Small changes Changed icon for app to be a cute joker card Changed some comments for various classes Made a controller folder to keep things more organized
Uploaded files uploaded a background, have not been able to add it to the menu yet Created a .css folder to use to set background if able to make it work Added some enums to card class
Menu Background Added a background to the main menu (If someone finds a better one, you can easily change it or ask me and I'll change it)
Menu Changed layout of menu
Uploaded card images Also tested out card images in Poker Game
Added a few get methods to Card class
New Game Button Fixed some bugs in Card class Fixed some bugs in Deck class Created a 'New Game' button in pokerGame-view and it so far it only creates a new deck and shuffles it.
Minor bug fixes In Deck class swapped added values to new cards (rank and suit were switched) In Card class added rank 1 is Ace instead of leaving it as 1
Cards now are correctly referenced in Poker Game Fixed file path to card images in Card Deck now deals top card after shuffling Card now has getCardImage() method
Confirmation Dialog for returning to menu from Poker Game

How to Play window added Created a new fxml for this new window (howToPlay-view.fxml) Created a new controller for this new window (HowToPlayController.java) In various classes fixed comments and javadocs
Created player class Player class has balance and hand of cards When game begins deck cards are given now to Players hand
Updated PokerGame-view.fxml Added image placement for cards used by dealer Updated background color to howToPlay screen and PokerGame screen

Updated Poker Game with buttons Added buttons for bet, check, raise, call Created empty functions for these buttons Created text field called gameText where user actions are updated based on button clicks

Back of card image added Referenced in Card class to each card obj Fold function in poker game now folds players hand face down Buttons now are invisible before the game begins Visibility of buttons is different depending on game progress
Updated UI of Poker Game
Updated UI and added Music Updated UI of Poker Game Added music to menu and game New checkbox to toggle music playing/paused Updated dependencies for media player
Music changes Music now loops when the song is completed Credit to music creator is now given as a tooltip to user

Changes to Player, PokerGame and others Moved song to Music folder and changed references Added username to Player PokerGame now references playerBalance and potBalance in UI Added a placeholder prompt for user to insert name Name is referened in poker game

Created ChooseGame Controller and view This new window will pop up when user clicks "Play Game" in menu User is able to click if they are playing a multiplayer or single player game so far multiplayer is not implemented so this is just a placeholder button Added two pictures dog.jpg and dogs.jpg to ChooseGame view
added some validating hand methods
Starting statistics stuff Changed some comments in various classes
Created new PokerGame function saveStatistics Worked on statistics button event in poker menu, will give system out messages if file exists or not
Created new Statistics window Game now saves statistics file when folding (will be when game ends when that is finished) Menu will open Statistics window that will show statistics info from text file
single player updates
replace cards
